title: Experience the Majesty of Rajasthan Tour Packages (Jiel Clark)
text: By Jiel Clark Aug 1, 2015 Rajasthan has a lot to offer in terms of a rich cultural lineage, bright colorful surroundings, timeless architectural wonders and cities that give us a peek into India's historical legacy.The food of Rajasthan is fascinating. Daal-Bati-Churma is the most popular dish of the state. Made of daal (lentils), baati and Churma (sweet), it is a succulent dish. Rajasthan is famous for foods that can last for days like Bikaneri Bhujia, Mirchi Bada, Pyaaj Kachori and Ghevar.Rajasthan is India's largest state by area spread out to 10.4 % of India's total area and tourism is a major revenue churner in the state. Around 30% of Rajasthan's population live from tourism.There are various travel packages available in the market that can let you get a nice stint of Rajasthan, however the package should be chosen keeping in mind the amount of time in hand. Exploring the entire Rajasthan might require a longer holiday. Hence you can also avail shorter packages that can combine the best of Rajasthan and can help you visit the main spots in a short span of time.Experiencing the enthralling history of Jaipur, the devoutness and mysticism of Pushkar, the bustling chaotic side of Ajmer and the wildlife reservoir and scenic splendor of Ranthambore, can be a treat to the eyes. All these cities form prime attractions of interest for tourists in Rajasthan. Many other tourist attractions of Rajasthan include the lake city of Udaipur, the scenic hill station Mount Abu and the city of palaces, forts and temples - Jodhpur.Southern Travels, a reputed tours and travel agency can offer some great tours for exploring the state and its rich cultural heritage. The Rajasthan tour packages include a 3D 2N package of Jaipur, Ajmer, Pushkar and Agra. This tour is a combination of some iconic spots of the state and has a lot to offer. The package includes a visit to Amber Fort, a fort which endorses both Hindu and Rajput artistic elements. Also includes the famous Jantar Mantar, which is a great place to view a collection of astronomical instruments and also the Hawa Mahal, which is a palace of breeze. The pious Brahma temple at Pushkar is also an inclusion. The tour takes us through Agra famous for some wonderful tourist attractions. The tour finally ends at Mathura.You can also avail the Colors of Rajasthan tour package, which is a 7D and 6N tour by Southern Travels that packs the colors of Jaipur, Ajmer, Pushkar, Mount Abu and Jodhpur in one package. Traverse the beautiful Hawa Mahal, Jantar Mantar and the historical Albert Hall in Jaipur and experience the divinity of the Dargah of Salim Chishti in Ajmer. Also encounter the scenic frame of Mount Abu and the majestic forts of Jodhpur.Another magnificent tour combines Delhi, Agra with Ranthambore and Jaipur. There are numerous Rajasthan tour packages that can give you a lot to explore.Therefore explore the state through the various tour packages that Southern has in offer. Let the traveler in you experience the beauty, architectural brilliance, cultural insight and rich heritage of the colorful state. Let the travel enthusiast in you traverse the by lanes of the state and encounter the majesty of Rajasthan. About the Author Southern Travels is one of the premium tour operators based in New Delhi , India. The company has an experience of 40 years and ever since has been rendering customized services to its clients. A team of professionals look into each aspect of travel and ensure the best holidaying experience. Attaining customer satisfaction of the highest level has always been their prime goal. Rating:
